hero.description: I build exceptional and accessible digital experiences for the web and mobile apps.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a frontend and mobile developer with over three years of experience building web and mobile applications using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and React Native. I’m passionate about technology and knowledge sharing, which is why I create tech content on social media and co-organize React JS Colombia, a community that fosters learning within the React ecosystem. I've worked on scalable interface development, API integration, and optimizing digital experiences. Additionally, I've helped small businesses establish their online presence with tailored web solutions. My approach combines technical expertise with communication, always aiming to create functional, engaging, and impactful products for users.
